alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Graves; Hickman (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 9:58AM EDT until August 12 at 10:45AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Fulton County in western Kentucky... Hickman County in western Kentucky... Southern Graves County in western Kentucky... Southeastern Mississippi County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 945 AM CDT. * At 858 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Clinton, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fulton, Hickman, Clinton, Cayce, Lynnville, Fulgham, Sedalia, Dorena, Wingo, Water Valley, Boundurant and Dukedom. This includes Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 1 and 16. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
